title: Virtual World-Based Science Communication English Intensive Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science terminology and general English communication skills
context.additional_context: Practical skill-centered program to enhance science classroom English competency for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Improve the ability to explain scientific experiment procedures in English in a virtual laboratory environment.
Conduct science concept question-and-answer activities through avatar interactions in a virtual world.
Develop learner-teacher communication strategies through science field-immersive role-play.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
